mapper.select: SELECT a.aptCode, a.apartmentName, REPLACE(b.dealAmount, ',', '') as dealAmount, a.buildYear, DATE(CONCAT(b.dealYear, '-', LPAD(b.dealMonth, 2, '0'), '-', b.dealDay)) as dealDate, a.roadName, a.dongCode, b.area as exclusiveArea, a.jibun, b.floor FROM houseinfo a JOIN housedeal b ON a.aptCode = b.aptCode WHERE a.dongCode = #{dongCode} ORDER BY dealDate DESC;

SELECT a.aptCode, a.apartmentName, REPLACE(b.dealAmount, ',', '') as dealAmount, a.buildYear, DATE(CONCAT(b.dealYear, '-', LPAD(b.dealMonth, 2, '0'), '-', b.dealDay)) as dealDate, a.roadName, a.dongCode, b.area as exclusiveArea, a.jibun, b.floor FROM houseinfo a JOIN housedeal b ON a.aptCode = b.aptCode WHERE a.apartmentName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{apartmentName}, '%') ORDER BY dealDate DESC;

SELECT a.aptCode, a.apartmentName, REPLACE(b.dealAmount, ',', '') as dealAmount, a.buildYear, DATE(CONCAT(b.dealYear, '-', LPAD(b.dealMonth, 2, '0'), '-', b.dealDay)) as dealDate, a.roadName, a.dongCode, b.area as exclusiveArea, a.jibun, b.floor FROM houseinfo a JOIN housedeal b ON a.aptCode = b.aptCode WHERE a.aptCode = #{aptCode} ORDER BY dealDate DESC;
